channel.title: How do I make NPCs have a shop?
channel.description: Hey. I made a Santa and some other guys and I was wondering how to make them have a shop. Do I go to CTG. Folder (Some its just autospawn, drops, shops, etc...) and click on shops and put the NPC's I.D. and put what I Want him to sell?? Id appreciate it if you could help :)

item.title: How do I make NPCs have a shop?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.source: How do I make NPCs have a shop?

item.title: How do I make NPCs have a shop?
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

Open up client.java. Search for wanneshop until u get to ur last shop. Press enter after the last

}

And enter this in.

else if (NPCID == Enter ID Here) { // Name of Shop (optional) PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = Id Of Shop Here;

Here is one of mine.

else if (NPCID == 1552) { // Santa Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 31;

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make NPCs have a shop?
